Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Board Brown Line trains on Orange Line platforms at Wash/Wells, Quincy, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Wash/Wabash, State/Lake & Clark/Lake

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a door problem on train.

As a result of the delayed train, Brown Line trains will be rerouted to the inner Loop (trains will board and exit on the Orange Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
